summary: This module implements a directional graph neural network architecture and associated utilities for training and evaluating on Open Graph Benchmark (OGB) datasets. It defines custom graph convolution layers, a full model, readout components, and dataset handling, and provides functions for aggregation, training epochs, and evaluation using DGL and PyTorch.
business_intent: Offer a ready-to-use example that demonstrates how to build, train, and assess a directional GNN for molecular property prediction tasks, facilitating research and development in graph representation learning.
